frase: Aunque está lloviendo hace buen día.
sentence: Even though its raining it is a good day.

sentence: Although the majority of the days are foggy.

sentence: And the Masonic symbol is very important in that movie.

frase: a partir de esa fecha

sentence: There is no other way to do it.

frase: El gobierno actual fue elegido democráticamente.
sentence: The present government was democratically elected.

frase: El gobierno de un país no es tarea fácil.
sentence: The governing of a country is not easy.

sentence: The administration of the bank needs the assistance of an expert.

frase: El gobierno debería tomar medidas para reducir la pobreza.
sentence: The government should take measures to reduce poverty.

sentence: Corruption is a persistent problem in many governments.

frase: El gobierno está trabajando en un plan para modernizar la infraestructura.
sentence: The government is working on a plan to modernize infrastructure.

sentence: Many citizens don't trust the government due to a lack of transparency.

sentence: Democracy requires that power be exercised by the representative government.

sentence: The government's fiscal policy will have a significant impact on the economy.

frase: La relación entre el gobierno y los sindicatos es esencial para garantizar derechos laborales justos.
sentence: The relationship between the government and unions is essential to ensure fair labor rights.

frase: El gobierno ha implementado medidas para proteger el medio ambiente.
sentence: The government has implemented measures to protect the environment.

frase: La reforma del sistema de salud es una prioridad para el gobierno actual.
sentence: Health system reform is a priority for the current government.

frase: Mi hijo estaba tan cansado cuando llegó que se durmió enseguida.
sentence: My son was so tired when he arrived that he fell asleep immediately.

sentence: What a long film!

sentence: The pattern of this granite is so unique and amazing.

sentence: A man is only as good as his word.

sentence: If you could just wait a few minutes, I'm sure the bus will arrive soon.

sentence: If you're so kind, please pass me the salt.

sentence: This room is as big as a stadium.

sentence: In my family, we always gather for dinner on weekends.

sentence: Three times three is equal to nine.

sentence: The wilderness is one of this country's most important tourist attractions.

frase: La nueva tecnología, según los expertos, revolucionará el mercado.
sentence: The new technology, according to the experts, will revolutionize the market.

frase: La temperatura debe ser de 20 grados Celsius, según el manual de usuario.
sentence: The temperature should be 20 degrees Celsius, according to the user manual.

frase: Según los rumores, habrá una gran sorpresa en la fiesta de esta noche.
sentence: According to the rumors, there will be a big surprise at tonight's party.

frase: La empresa, según sus últimos informes, tiene un buen desempeño en el mercado.
sentence: The company, according to its latest reports, has good market performance.

frase: Según los estudios, la meditación tiene muchos beneficubrimientos saludables.
sentence: According to studies, meditation has many healthy discoveries.

frase: Los invitados llegarán a las 7 pm, según la lista de RSVP.
sentence: The guests will arrive at 7 pm, according to the RSVP list.

frase: El resultado del partido, según los comentaristas, fue sorprendente.
sentence: The result of the game, according to the commentators, was surprising.

frase: Tengo menos tiempo libre hoy que ayer.
sentence: I have less free time today than yesterday.

frase: El profesor tiene menos alumnos en sus clases este semestre.
sentence: The teacher has fewer students in his classes this semester.

frase: La persona que menos agua gaste ganará.
sentence: The person who wastes the least amount of water will win.

frase: La ardilla con menos bellotas tiene que ponerse a trabajar.
sentence: The squirrel with the fewest acorns needs to get busy.

frase: La temperatura hoy está a menos diez grados.
sentence: The temperature today is ten below zero.

frase: Cinco menos dos son tres.
sentence: Five minus two is three.

frase: Son las once menos diez.
sentence: It is ten to eleven.

frase: Te faltó escribir el menos en tu ecuación.
sentence: You forgot to write the minus sign in your equation.

frase: El tiempo está más o menos soleado hoy, pero puede llover más tarde.
sentence: The weather is more or less sunny today, but it may rain later.

frase: Menos es más en este caso.
sentence: Less is more in this case.

frase: No quiero hablar con él, menos aún ahora.
sentence: I don't want to talk to him, even less now.

frase: Me gustaría tener menos trabajo y más tiempo libre.
sentence: I would like to have less work and more free time.

frase: Es mejor tener menos amigos de confianza que muchos conocidos superficiales.
sentence: It's better to have fewer trusted friends than many superficial acquaintances.
